question: Duarte Pacheco has been elected as the President of which international body?
explanation:
Duarte Pacheco of Portugal has been elected as the new President of Inter Parliamentary Union (IPU). He would hold the office for the period from 2020 to 2023.
The Inter Parliamentary Union (IPU) is an international organisation of various nationsâ€™ parliament. It was established in 1889 and is head quartered at Geneva, Switzerland.
